drinks.title: Classic Margarita
instructions: Rim the glass with salt.
In a shaker, combine tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and sugar.
Shake well and strain into the glass filled with ice.
Garnish with lime wedges.

drinks.title: Strawberry Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle strawberries, mint leaves, lime juice, and sugar.
Add rum and ice.
Top with club soda and stir gently.

breakfast.title: Fluffy Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with your favorite toppings.

breakfast.title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
In a bowl, mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture onto the toast.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes (if desired) and garnish with cilantro or basil.

lunch.title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Alternate slices of tomato and mozzarella on a serving plate.
Tuck basil leaves in between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper.

lunch.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
instructions: Lay out the tortilla wraps and spread Caesar dressing evenly on each.
Place the shredded chicken, romaine lettuce, and Parmesan cheese in the center of each wrap.
Season with salt and pepper.
Fold in the sides of the wraps and roll tightly.
Slice in half and serve.

dinner.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic, and cook until softened.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, beef broth, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti and garnish with Parmesan cheese.

dinner.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
In a small bowl, combine melted butter, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried dill, salt, and pepper.
Brush the salmon fillets with the butter mixture.
Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked to your desired doneness.
Remove from the grill and garnish with fresh parsley.

dessert.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large bowl, cream together butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix well.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.

dessert.title: Strawberry Shortcake
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsalted butter, cold and cubed
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425째F (220째C).
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Cut in the cold butter using a pastry cutter or your fingers until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Stir in the milk until just combined.
Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead gently a few times.
Pat the dough into a 1-inch thick rectangle and cut out shortcakes using a round biscuit cutter.
Place the shortcakes onto a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown.
Allow the shortcakes to cool slightly.
To assemble, split the shortcakes in half, top with sliced strawberries and whipped cream, then replace the top half of the shortcake.
